description:
Located in Barcelona, Norma specializes in offering artisanal cakes with a variety of flavors and options.
As a first stage, we presented the cakes, their history, and the different steps to place an order, with a site in "One Page" format.
After 1 year, we sought to evolve the site and expanded the sections to include different types of cakes and flavors.
The next step is to offer payment options that allow cake sales directly from the website.
Based on React and with modularized content, it allows for easy updates.
